title: Peter in Flight
description: Peter can tell you how to run a great marketing campaign. He can tell you everything there is to know about successful trade show programs. He can tell you stories about the thousands of people he has met, miles he has flown, hotel rooms he has stayed in, and ways to work the system to your advantage when you travel. But he canâ€™t tell the woman he loves how he feels.
author: Paul Michael Peters
